name: FLISLAND
description:
Herd animals on floating islands using spells.

Made for GameInTenDays 93 in under ten days.

----

Manual:

Portals - Teleport to another island.

Rock - A Rock.

Poof - Gently pushes things around.

Tornado - Lifts things in the air, destroying environment obstacles.

Shock - Temporarily stops animals.

Shrink - Shrinks animals so small you can't see them. Totally not destroying them in the process.

Conjure - Makes animals randomly.

Win condition:

Gather at least 30 cats, 20 humans, and 10 cows on their respective islands.
